data.title: Erin Invicta Everly fansite

data.text:
About Erin

Erin Invicta Everly was born in Los Angeles on November 8, 1965 to musician Don Everly of The Everly Brothers and model/actress Venetia Stevenson. Erin moved from Los Angeles to New York in 1982 to join Wilhelmina Models. She appeared in many print ads and commercials in the 1980s for the likes of Jordache, Bebe, and Guess. She also appears in the Guns N’ Roses music video for “Sweet Child o’ Mine” and “It’s so easy”.

Her siblings are brother musician Edan Everly and sister Stacy Everly. Soap opera actress Anna Lee was her grandmother and her grandfather was Robert Stevenson (director). She is also niece to Phil Everly from the Everly Brothers.She is the granddaughter of Robert Stevenson, who is an English film writer and director, directed a number of British films & Anna Lee, who was an American actress. Ike Everly, who belonged to music background was the parental grandfather of Erin. Her siblings include a brother and a sister. Her uncles include Phil Everly (Musician), Jeffrey Bayron (Actor), Steve Stafford (Actor), John Stafford and Hugh Howard Stevenson. Jason Everly, Chris Everly, Evan Stafford are the cousins of Erin Everly.

Everly began dating Axl Rose in the mid 1980s. Rose wrote the lyrics of “Sweet Child o’ Mine” about her, and she appeared in the video for the song. Rose and Everly were wed on April 28, 1990 in Las Vegas. The couple separated after less than a month of marriage, but later reconciled for several months, during which time Everly became pregnant. She suffered a miscarriage in October 1990. Their marriage was annulled in January 1991.

Erin moved to Atlanta in Georgia. she has managed to guard herself and her children from the public eye, immensely enjoying a private family life. She is a proud mother of Easan, Eres and Esper.
